monster.name: Hurricane
languages: Understands Auran but does not speak it

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The Storm can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The Storm doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Living Storm
entries: The Storm is 3 ({@damage 1d6}) * 100 feet in diameter. Heavy precipitation in the form of either rain or snow falls there, causing the area to be lightly obscured. Heavy rain also extinguishes open flames and imposes disadvantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.
In addition, strong winds swirl in the area covered by the storm. The winds impose disadvantage on ranged attack rolls. The winds extinguish open flames and disperse fog

action.name: Water Jet
entries: The storm magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 5 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage, but is neither pushed nor knocked prone.

action.name: Whelm {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also knocked {@condition prone}. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

action.name: Freezing Strikes {@recharge 5}
entries: The Storm launches 3 ice spikes: +7 to hit, 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the this turn.

action.name: Tidal Breath {@recharge 6}
entries: The Storm unleashes a wave of frigid seawater in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) bludgeoning damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) cold damage, and is pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

trait.name: Oceanic Soul
entries: When you are fully submerged any creature that is also fully submerged can understand your speech and you can understand theirs.

trait.name: Agonizing Blast
entries: When Captain Ashbeak hits a creature with {@spell eldritch blast}, each damage roll gets a +4 bonus.

trait.name: Lance of Lethargy (1/Turn)
entries: When Captain Ashbeak hits a creature with your {@spell eldritch blast}, that creature's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.

trait.name: Repelling Blast
entries: When Captain Ashbeak hits a creature with your {@spell eldritch blast}, that creature's speed can be pushed up to 10 feet away from you in a straight line.

trait.name: Expert Duplication
entries: Captain Ashbeak has advantage on any ability checks to produce an exact duplicate of writing or craftwork.

trait.name: Kenku Recall (3/Long Rest
entries: Captain Ashbeak can give himself when he makes a skill check he has proficiency in.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Captain Ashbeak can accurately mimic sounds and voices he has heard. A creature can tell they are imitations only with a successful {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

trait.name: Gift of the Sea
entries: Captain Ashbeak can breathe underwater.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Captain Ashbeak is a 6th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). Captain Ashbeak has the following warlock spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rod of the Pact Keeper (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Captain Ashbeak regains one warlock spell slot.

bonus.name: Tentacle of the Deeps (3/Long Rest)
entries: Captain Ashbeak creates a 10-foot-long tentacle at a point within 60 feet and the tentacle lasts for 1 minute. When creating the tentacle, Captain Ashbeak can make a melee spell attack against one creature within 10 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
On subsequent turns while the tentacle is active, Captain Ashbeak can move it 30 ft. and make the attack again.

reaction.name: Guardian Coil
entries: While Captain Ashbeak's {@b {@i Tentacle of the Deeps}} is active and he sees a creature take damage while within 10 feet of the tentacle, it can reduce the damage to that creature by 4 ({@damage 1d8}).

trait.name: Actor
entries: Le Capitaine has advantage on Charisma ({@skill Deception}) and Charisma ({@skill Performance}) checks made to hide his identity.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Gift of the Depths
entries: Le Capitaine can breathe underwater.

trait.name: Repelling Blast
entries: When Le Capitaine hits a creature with eldritch blast, he can push the creature up to 10 feet away from him in a straight line

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Le Capitaine's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Le Capitaine is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Le Capitaine has the following warlock spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Change Appearance
entries: Le Capitaine can change his appearance and voice. He determine the specifics of the changes and can adjust his height and weight, but must remain medium sized.
He stays in this new form until he uses an action to revert to his true form or until he die.

action.name: Command Familiar
entries: Le Capitaine's familiar makes one Attack of its own with its Reaction.

action.name: Fey Presence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Le Capitaine causes each creature in a 10-foot cube to make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} until the end of his next turn.

action.name: Rod of the Pact Keeper (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Le Capitaine regains one warlock spell slot.

bonus.name: Investment of the Chain Master
entries: Le Capitaine can command his familiar to take the Attack action.

reaction.name: Beguiling Defenses
entries: When another creature attempts to charm Le Capitaine he can force them to make a 16 {@dc Wisdom} saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute or until the creature takes any damage.

reaction.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: In response to taking damage, Le Capitaine turns {@condition invisible} and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. He remains invisible until the start of his next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

reaction.name: Protect Familiar
entries: When Le Capitaine's familiar takes damage, it instead has resistance to that damage.

reaction.name: Shape Up, Ye Dog (2/Day)
entries: Whenever a friendly creature within 30 feet of Le Capitaine that can hear him misses with an attack, Le Capitaine can yell perilous threats to allow that creature to reroll the attack roll.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The {@i Smitty Werbenjagermanjensen} can take one additional action on their turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Glacier can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Combat Superiority (4d8/Long Rest)
entries: Glacier can use the following abilities:

items.name: {@i {@b Trip Attack}}
items.entry: When Glacier hits with a weapon attack they add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll. They can force a Large or smaller target to succeed a 15 {@dc Strength} saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

items.name: {@i {@b Disarming Attack}}
items.entry: When Glacier hits with a weapon attack they add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll. They can force the target to succeed a 15 {@dc Strength} saving throw or drop the object you choose. The object lands at its feet.

items.name: {@i {@b Goading Attack}}
items.entry: When Glacier hits with a weapon attack they add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll. They can force the target to succeed a 15 {@dc Wisdom} saving throw or the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than Glacier until the end of your next turn.

trait.name: Tavern Brawler
entries: The Glacier has proficiency with improvised weapons. The damage die and type of an improvised weapon are determined by the DM. Thrown improvised weapons does 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) damage with range 20/60 ft.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Glacier's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Glacier makes two attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Antimatter Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d8 + 1}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

bonus.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The Glacier can to regain 11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) HP.

bonus.name: Tavern Brawler
entries: When the Glacier hits a creature with an unarmed strike or an improvised weapon he can attempt to grapple the target.

legendaryGroup.name: Captain Ashbeak
lairActions: When fighting inside its lair, the iago ashbeak can invoke the ambient magic to take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the iago ashbeak can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects:
